video.title: Arrow
video.synopsis: Based on DC Comics' Green Arrow, an affluent playboy becomes a vengeful superhero, saving the city from villains armed with just a bow and arrows.

episodes.synopsis: Presumed dead for five years before being discovered on a remote Pacific island, billionaire playboy Oliver Queen returns home a changed man.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Oliver sets his sights on taking down a criminal with ties to the Chinese triad: Martin Somers, who's being prosecuted by Laurel.
episodes.title: Honor Thy Father

episodes.synopsis: When a gunman kills one of Oliver's targets, he enlists Det. Lance's help. Meanwhile, Laurel and Tommy find themselves caught in an awkward situation.
episodes.title: Lone Gunmen

episodes.synopsis: While looking into a murder case, Oliver realizes that one of the targets on his list has framed an innocent man for the crime.
episodes.title: An Innocent Man

episodes.synopsis: When Oliver is arrested for murder, he insists that Laurel represent him in court. She takes the case, putting her at odds with her father.
episodes.title: Damaged

episodes.synopsis: A band of bank robbers dubbed the Royal Flush Gang seriously wounds an off-duty police officer during a heist, forcing Oliver to rethink his mission.
episodes.title: Legacies

episodes.synopsis: The Huntress arrives in Starling City and puts Oliver under her spell. Meanwhile, adverse events blindside Tommy, who turns to Laurel for support.
episodes.title: Muse of Fire

episodes.synopsis: Oliver trains Helena to be his ally. Later, her pursuit of vengeance leads Helena to kill the leader of the triad.
episodes.title: Vendetta

episodes.synopsis: Determined to make up for lost time and restore a sense of normality to the Queen household, Oliver throws a family Christmas party.
episodes.title: Year's End

episodes.synopsis: After the Dark Archer defeats Oliver, he loses confidence and takes a break from being Arrow -- until Laurel needs help probing a firefighter's death.
episodes.title: Burned

episodes.synopsis: Oliver suspects that Diggle's mentor is responsible for some armored truck robberies. Meanwhile, Thea believes Moira and Malcolm are having an affair.
episodes.title: Trust but Verify

episodes.synopsis: Thea finds herself in legal trouble after getting caught with a drug called Vertigo. Meanwhile, Felicity gives Oliver disturbing news about Moira.
episodes.title: Vertigo

episodes.synopsis: A nasty crook released from prison plans to reclaim his place as leader of Starling City's underworld but first must take down his biggest foe: Arrow.
episodes.title: Betrayal

episodes.synopsis: When Oliver is shot, he turns to Felicity for help. While hovering between life and death, he flashes back to a daring escape attempt on the island.
episodes.title: The Odyssey

episodes.synopsis: Oliver asks Det. McKenna Hall on a date. Meanwhile, a jewel thief named Dodger hits Starling City and targets someone close to Oliver.
episodes.title: Dodger

episodes.synopsis: Oliver and Diggle learn that Deadshot is still alive and that Malcolm is the next target. Meanwhile, Oliver urges Tommy to reconcile with his father.
episodes.title: Dead to Rights

episodes.synopsis: The Huntress returns to town and threatens to destroy everything and everyone Oliver cares about. Later, Steve Aoki headlines the nightclub opening.
episodes.title: The Huntress Returns

episodes.synopsis: An angry resident of the Glades embarks on a kidnapping and killing spree to punish those he believes have wronged the residents of his neighborhood.
episodes.title: Salvation

episodes.synopsis: When a young woman meets a violent death after partying at Verdant, Det. Lance uncovers incriminating evidence against Tommy.
episodes.title: Unfinished Business

episodes.synopsis: When Deadshot returns to Starling City after taking down a U.S. ambassador and six others abroad, a sting operation is launched to capture him alive.
episodes.title: Home Invasion

episodes.synopsis: As Oliver focuses on crossing another name off the list, Felicity finds a transaction on a shady accountant's laptop that may help him locate Walter.
episodes.title: The Undertaking

episodes.synopsis: With the Undertaking just days away, Malcolm dons his black hood to conclude business with seismologist Brion Markov and his team.
episodes.title: Darkness on the Edge of Town

episodes.synopsis: In the season finale, Oliver and Diggle try to stop the Dark Archer from unleashing his vengeance on the Glades. Meanwhile, Thea races to find Roy.
episodes.title: Sacrifice

episodes.synopsis: With Starling City and Queen Consolidated deteriorating fast, Diggle and Felicity travel to Lian Yu Island to convince Oliver to return as the Arrow.
episodes.title: City of Heroes

episodes.synopsis: Oliver learns that medicine is being hijacked on the way to Glades Memorial Hospital, leading to a showdown with Bronze Tiger and China White.
episodes.title: Identity

episodes.synopsis: Felicity offers herself as bait so Arrow, Diggle and Lance can catch a criminal who broke out of prison and is torturing and murdering women.
episodes.title: Broken Dolls

episodes.synopsis: Oliver learns that a man known as "The Mayor" is bringing illegal guns into the Glades, so he sponsors a cash for guns event to clean up the city.
episodes.title: Crucible

episodes.synopsis: Oliver tries to get the Canary to reveal her background. Meanwhile, the Assistant District Attorney offers Moira a life-or-death deal.
episodes.title: League of Assassins

episodes.synopsis: Diggle learns that Lyla is missing after following a lead in Moscow. Moira's lawyer tells Thea that dating Roy is hurting her mother's case.
episodes.title: Keep Your Enemies Closer

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious illness sweeps the city, infecting hundreds of people -- including Diggle. Moira goes on trial for her participation in the Undertaking.
episodes.title: State v. Queen

episodes.synopsis: A seemingly impossible robbery at Queen Consolidated's Applied Sciences Division brings Central City police scientist Barry Allen to town.
episodes.title: The Scientist

episodes.synopsis: Oliver is visited by ghosts from the past. Meanwhile, Barry continues to help Felicity, and their connection grows stronger.
episodes.title: Three Ghosts

episodes.synopsis: Oliver must tackle a new threat when bombs start to go off in Starling City, and Thea witnesses Roy's super-strength in action.
episodes.title: Blast Radius

episodes.synopsis: Arrow teams up with Laurel to find the Man in the Mask, and when Sin tests Roy's superstrength, the results are nearly fatal.
episodes.title: Blind Spot

episodes.synopsis: Arrow offers to teach Roy to control his superstrength, but Roy proves to be a rebellious student. Meanwhile, the Bronze Tiger becomes a threat again.
episodes.title: Tremors

episodes.synopsis: Sara is forced to make an important decision when her past with the League of Assassins comes back to haunt her -- and her family.
episodes.title: Heir to the Demon

episodes.synopsis: The team goes after the Clock King, who has tech that can open any bank vault in Starling City, while Sara ruffles Queen's feathers.
episodes.title: Time of Death

episodes.synopsis: Back on the island where Oliver spent years shipwrecked, his plan with Slade and Sara to take over a freighter from Ivo takes a deadly turn.
episodes.title: The Promise

episodes.synopsis: With Slade back and vowing revenge on Oliver's loved ones, Oliver prepares for battle; Diggle is recruited by A.R.G.U.S. to stop a warlord.
episodes.title: Suicide Squad

episodes.synopsis: When Frank Bertinelli is arrested and Laurel is picked to try the case, Bertinelli's daughter, the Huntress, returns with her own take on justice.
episodes.title: Birds of Prey

episodes.synopsis: Slade makes his move against Oliver, with enormous repercussions. Meanwhile, Isabel attempts to take Queen Consolidated away from Oliver.
episodes.title: Deathstroke

episodes.synopsis: After an epic battle with Slade, one member of Team Arrow is sent to the hospital, and Oliver is forced to make a tough decision involving Thea.
episodes.title: The Man Under the Hood

episodes.synopsis: When the team realizes that the Mirakuru has taken over Roy completely, rendering him deadly and out of control, they're forced to take action.
episodes.title: Seeing Red

episodes.synopsis: To stop Slade, Oliver may have to make the ultimate sacrifice, but Diggle and Felicity go to extreme measures to stop him.
episodes.title: City of Blood

episodes.synopsis: Oliver and his team rally to stop Slade's soldiers as they attack Starling City. Meanwhile, Malcolm Merlyn returns.
episodes.title: Streets of Fire

episodes.synopsis: Oliver's no-kill rule is put to the ultimate test when Slade kidnaps someone close to Oliver's heart. Meanwhile, Diggle takes on Amanda Waller.
episodes.title: Unthinkable

episodes.synopsis: In the wake of Slade's downfall, the peaceful city celebrates, but Werner Zytle has a deadly plot up his sleeve, and a homicidal archer targets Sara.
episodes.title: The Calm

episodes.synopsis: Oliver pursues a murderous archer; Laurel tries to take justice for Sara's death into her own hands; Thea makes progress in her training with Merlyn.
episodes.title: Sara

episodes.synopsis: Oliver trails Thea to an island, hoping to bring her back to Starling City; Oliver helps Diggle find a missing ARGUS agent; Laurel tries to toughen up.
episodes.title: Corto Maltese

episodes.synopsis: When Oliver sends Roy out to tail Nyssa and learn more about Sara's killer, Thea gets kidnapped, and Oliver makes a dangerous enemy.
episodes.title: The Magician

episodes.synopsis: Felicity investigates a cyberattack on Starling City and discovers that she herself created the virus; Roy's nightmares tell him that he killed Sara.
episodes.title: The Secret Origin of Felicity Smoak

episodes.synopsis: When bodies appear at the gym, Oliver helps prove Ted Grant's innocence and catch the killer; Roy faces the aftermath of the Mirakuru virus.
episodes.title: Guilty

episodes.synopsis: Oliver investigates a menace named Cupid, who is romantically obsessed with him; Oliver feels pangs of jealousy over Ray's rapport with Felicity.
episodes.title: Draw Back Your Bow

episodes.synopsis: A boomerang-wielding murderer defies Oliver's team and ARGUS; Digger lays a trap for Lyla with the intent to kill her and whomever stands in his way.
episodes.title: The Brave and the Bold

episodes.synopsis: The League of Assassins issues a terrifying threat; the DNA results of Sara's murder investigation shock Felicity; Oliver faces a formidable foe.
episodes.title: The Climb

episodes.synopsis: With the Arrow gone, Diggle and Roy strive to protect Starling City as a new crime lord plots a power grab; Merlyn finds evidence of Oliver's demise.
episodes.title: Left Behind

episodes.synopsis: Maseo and Tatsu must go to extremes to protect the healing Oliver; Brick kidnaps a city official and tries to banish the police force from the Glades.
episodes.title: Midnight City

episodes.synopsis: Oliver finds a mentor to help him bring down Ra's; Capt. Lance advises Roy and Laurel on fighting Brick's men; Merlyn discovers who killed his wife.
episodes.title: Uprising

episodes.synopsis: When Laurel tries to capture Zytle after his prison break, he doses her with his poison, Vertigo; DJ Chase tries to murder League trainee Thea.
episodes.title: Canaries

episodes.synopsis: As Oliver starts training Thea on the island of Lian Yu, Slade captures and imprisons them, and Thea is forced to face a painful truth.
episodes.title: The Return

episodes.synopsis: Oliver sets out to rescue Merlyn to keep Thea from disconnecting with her humanity once she realizes that she has sealed her father's dire fate.
episodes.title: Nanda Parbat

episodes.synopsis: With a plot in mind, Ra's pushes Oliver to take over the League, revealing the secret of his longevity; Capt. Lance withdraws his support of Arrow.
episodes.title: The Offer

episodes.synopsis: A honeymoon for Diggle and Lyla is cut short when they are recruited for a dangerous rescue mission; an Arrow imposter murders the mayor.
episodes.title: Suicidal Tendencies

episodes.synopsis: Arrow's team is hunted down for the mayor's murder; a bullet wound threatens Ray's life; Ra's kidnaps Captain Lance and exposes Arrow's identity.
episodes.title: Public Enemy

episodes.synopsis: When Roy is arrested, Oliver's crew plots to spring him from prison and protect Arrow's identity; Ray needs Oliver's help to bring down Jake Simmons.
episodes.title: Broken Arrow

episodes.synopsis: When Oliver tries to bring Thea back from the brink of death, he is forced to renounce his old life and step into a new role with the League.
episodes.title: The Fallen

episodes.synopsis: Oliver takes on a new identity and a daunting test of allegiance; Ra's recalls dueling his best friend to become the leader of the League.
episodes.title: Al Sah-him

episodes.synopsis: Diggle and Laurel patrol Starling City; Oliver learns who provided Ra's with the Omega virus and confesses the truth about his place in the League.
episodes.title: This Is Your Sword

episodes.synopsis: Oliver and his team race to stop Ra's from releasing the virus and destroying Starling City, but as the dust settles, Oliver makes a fateful choice.
episodes.title: My Name is Oliver Queen
